Entries.19_2: Emily and Haley...those two girls used to play all the time together when they were kids.#$b#I wonder what happened?
Entries.22_2: Sam...I remember him being quite a handful when he was growing up.

Entries.19_2: Penny...George and I had to take her under our wing a little bit after Pam, you know.#$e#Pam's had a hard life, we did what we could for Penny.#$e#As they say, it takes a town, it was the least we could do.
Entries.22_2: Penny's certainly grown up well, hasn't she?$h
